title: Disaster recovery RPO: 1 hour, RTO: 4 hours
summary: Implement disaster recovery with Recovery Point Objective (RPO) of 1 hour and Recovery Time Objective (RTO) of 4 hours.
description: Reliability requirement: Establish disaster recovery capabilities with Recovery Point Objective (RPO) of 1 hour (maximum data loss) and Recovery Time Objective (RTO) of 4 hours (maximum downtime) to ensure business continuity.
